column1: table with row headers in column A and column headers in rows 3 through 4. (leading dots indicate sub-parts)
Table 1: Annual Estimates of the Resident Population for the United States, Regions, States, and Puerto Rico: April 1, 2000 to July 1, 2008

Note: The April 1, 2000 Population Estimates base reflects changes to the Census 2000 population from the Count Question Resolution program and geographic program revisions.  See Geographic Terms and Definitions at https://www.census.gov/popest/geographic/ for a list of the states that are included in each region.
